mapper.select: SELECT A.HW_SEQ AS hwSeq, A.TITLE AS title, A.REG_DT AS regDt, CONCAT(B.FILE_PATH , B.FILE_NM) AS filePath, CONCAT(B.FILE_URL, B.FILE_NM ) AS fileUrl, CHECK_YN AS checkYn, REG_ID AS regId, DATE_FORMAT(reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS regDt FROM BCU_HOMEWORK A, BCU_FILE B WHERE A.FILE_SEQ = B.FILE_SEQ ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD( BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE ) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(BNO)+1, 1) FROM TBL_BOARD), #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT A.HW_SEQ AS hwSeq, A.TITLE AS title, A.REPLY AS reply, A.REG_DT AS regDt, CONCAT(B.FILE_PATH , B.FILE_NM) AS filePath, CONCAT(B.FILE_URL, B.FILE_NM ) AS fileUrl, CHECK_YN AS checkYn, REG_ID AS regId, DATE_FORMAT(reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS regDt FROM BCU_HOMEWORK A, BCU_FILE B WHERE A.HW_SEQ = ${hwSeq} AND A.FILE_SEQ = B.FILE_SEQ
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_BOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, WRITER = #{writer}, modi_date = SYSDATE WHERE BNO = #{bno}
